author: Ricardo
fundamentals: Correlation between the value of a good and the labor required to produce the good

author: Marx
fundamentals: Exchange-value is the quantitative aspect of value, as opposed to “use-value” which is the qualitative aspect of value, and constitutes the substratum of the price of a commodity.

author: Menger
fundamentals: The subjective theory of value believes that a good's value depends on the consumers wants and needs

author: Keynes
fundamentals: Monetary theory posits that a change in money supply is a key driver of economic activity. MV = PQ.

author: Jonathan Nitzan Shimshon Bichler
fundamentals: The power theory of value approaches the question of valuation from the top down, by which the dominant owners of the bulk of societal wealth, determine the value of their assets.
